properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
NORTH CAROLINA.
DNC 17.
F/V REEL ACTION, ONE PERSON ON BOARD, OVERDUE
AT 070330Z MAR. LAST KNOWN POSITION IN VICINITY
BALD HEAD ISLAND (33-52-02N 078-00-24W).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
PHONE: 757 398 6231, FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: RCCNORFOLK@USCG.MIL.
